pages.text: Some ores simply don't exist on Helios-2, you can't seive for it, nor can Orechids create it, and instead you have to explore space in order to find these exceptionally 'rare' minerals.

pages.title: Dilithium
pages.text: This ore spawns all across the galaxy, although it's slightly more common on moons.

pages.title: Titanium
pages.text: This ore spawns all across the galaxy, although it's slightly more common on moons.

pages.title: Iridium
pages.text: This ore spawns on more 'earth-like' planets.

pages.title: Platinum
pages.text: This ore spawns on more 'earth-like' planets.

pages.title: Destabilized Redstone
pages.text: This ore spawns on more 'earth-like' planets.

pages.title: Prosperity Shards
pages.text: This ore spawns on dry planets.

pages.title: Dimensional Shards
pages.text: This ore spawns on dry planets.

pages.title: Energized Netherrack
pages.text: This ore spawns on dry planets.

pages.title: Draconium
pages.text: This ore spawns on colder planets.

pages.title: Ender Biotite
pages.text: This ore spawns on colder planets.

pages.title: Resonant Endstone
pages.text: This ore spawns on colder planets.
